background.agility and coordination: Character can catch and handle ordinary snakes if he successfully saves vs. poison (with a +4 bonus.)
background.beauty: Character has attractively straight teeth, and also has a swayback.
background.choices: Character has fathered a child out of wedlock. The mother is 3 months pregnant.
background.family composition: Character raised by mother and father. Has paternal grandmother, paternal grandfather, maternal grandfather; brother who is 4 years younger, brother who is 2 years older, brother who is 4 years older, brother who is 4 years older.
background.father legacy: Drive Animals ability; reduce travel damage by one point
background.feats of strength: Strong upper body. For slings, bows (not crossbows), and all thrown weapons, increase short range by 1 hex, and medium and long ranges by 2 hexes.
background.relationships: Character has been made a member of the Illuminati. Tell nobody.
